amendatorysection.para: All warrants shall be drawn payable to the claimant or bearer, the same as county warrants, except as otherwise herein provided.

crossreference.para: For provisions as to interest on warrants, see section 45-106.

annotation.para: Warrants issued by officers of irrigation district prior to levy and when no fund exists are void. Elliott v. Calamus Irr. Dist., 120 Neb. 714, 235 N.W. 95 (1931).
